name: Pantazil
description:
The Pantazil is a 2D exploration and platform game with a pixel art style.

The player controls a young explorer called Zizi, full of energy and with a notorious identity, while exploring the places the photographer had passed when exploring in nature at the inauguration of the Marechal Rondon memorial in 2016.

Zizi lives in a house in the middle of the Pantanal and suddenly receives a letter from his best friend, Dito the photographer, requesting urgent help to recover the photos that were taken and that the wind directed them into the vast biodiversity of the forested Pantanal mato-grossense.

Because they are photos that have a very high emotional value added, the main character treats them as a priceless treasure that must be recovered.

The young explorer will look for the photos as he enters the Pantanal with extreme caution, as he must be careful with mobs that can interfere with his journey and any casualties he will find on his way, in addition to being aware of the time allocated to each phase.

During your journey it will be possible to encounter alligators (Caiman yacare), Southern Lapwing(Vanellus chilensis) and other animals that can delay the young explorer.

If you manage to recover the photos within the estimated time, your friend will reward you with a surprise, in addition to strengthening the friendship between the two young people.

Gameplay:
Pantazil's gameplay is 2D platformer with:
-Walking.
-Jumping.

Curiosity:
The game will have the difficulties for the player to face the challenge, with modes:
-Kids
-Easy
-Normal
-Hard


All these modes will show the environment of the wetland nature. And each one will have different amounts of photos, different weather, enemies and different maps.

This game is part of the Public Selection Notice No. 09/2021/SECEL/MT/Brazil, Electronic Games - Games.
